summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Dream Journal app with new features: Calendar view, Pattern Analysis, PDF export, and Dream Streak gamification. Backend APIs working excellently (93.8% success rate). All new features implemented and functional.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - both status codes indicate authentication failure

integration_issues.issue: Sessions expire frequently requiring re-login during testing

passed_tests: Backend: Updated Stats API with streak fields (current_streak, longest_streak)
Frontend: Login functionality with test credentials (demo@test.com)
Frontend: Dashboard with new streak display (1 Day Streak banner)
Frontend: Calendar view with monthly navigation
Frontend: Calendar dream indicators (purple dots on dates with dreams)
Frontend: Calendar date selection showing dream list
Frontend: Pattern Analysis page with all sections (Recurring Symbols, Word Cloud, Monthly Activity, Theme Evolution)
Frontend: PDF export functionality - Export All button on dreams list
Frontend: PDF export functionality - Individual dream export button
Frontend: Navigation links for Calendar and Patterns in sidebar
Frontend: Quick action buttons for Calendar and Patterns on dashboard
